diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $RQ$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $PQ$ is $2x + 1$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $PT$ is $10$ units.
Point $T$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $P$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
The lines $RS$ and $QT$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $SP$, $SR$, $ST$, forming a triangle $SPR$.
There are lines $PQ$, $PT$, $RP$, forming a triangle $PQR$.
The lines $TQ$ and $SP$ are perpendicular to each other.
